message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and add substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and benefits, the product is worth $12000 to you. I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $10800. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a savings of $1200 compared to the market value. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with this special offer.
